DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Moxibustion effective manage primary dysmenorrhea . Aim : To attest effectiveness safety moxibustion primary dysmenorrhea . Design : A randomized control trial . 152 participant include . Two arm : moxibustion treatment group ibuprofen control group .
DOC.detailed_description: There convince evidence efficacy moxibustion primary dysmenorrhea , due low methodologic quality small sample size . The investigator design random clinical trial investigates effectiveness moxibustion treat primary dysmenorrhea , purpose study provide research base moxibustion efficacy . The investigator also examine acceptability adverse effect associate use moxibustion .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Guidelines Primary dysmenorrhea clinical Society Obstetricians Gynaecologists Canada Menstrual cycle regular ( 28±7 ) day Syndrome differentiation Traditional Chinese Medicine : Congealing colddamp Qistagnation blood stasis Mean value ≥40mm last 3 month Informed consent form must sign patient lineal relative Patients secondary dysmenorrhea , cause endometriosis , pelvic inflammation , myoma uterus Patients unconscious psychotic Patients serious primary illness disease cardiovascular , liver , renal , gastrointestinal , hematological system Patients take prostaglandin synthetase inhibitor ( PGSI ) 2 week inclusion Pregnant woman woman lactation
